entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 a.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
